properties.entry: select (select ifnull(sum(amount),0) from feetransactiondebit dr join studentDetail sd on dr.File_No = sd.File_No where (sd.session_id != dr.session_id or sd.batch_id != dr.batch_id) and sd.file_no=:File_No)-(select sum(amount) from feetransactioncredit cr join studentDetail sd on cr.File_No = sd.File_No where (sd.session_id != cr.session_id or sd.batch_id != cr.batch_id) and sd.file_no=:File_No) as difference;

select sd.File_No, sd.First_Name, sd.Last_Name, sd.Enroll_No, sd.Father_Name, sd.Gender, sd.DOB, cm.Course, bm.Branch, sd.Semester, sd.Academic_Year, sd.Updated_On, balanceAmount.Pending_Fee from (select cr.file_no, sum(cr.amount)-sum(dr.amount) as Pending_Fee from feetransactioncredit cr join feetransactiondebit dr on cr.File_No = dr.File_No) as balanceAmount join studentdetail sd on cr.file_No=sd.File_No join coursemaster cm ON cm.Id = sd.Course_Id join coursebranchmaster bm ON bm.Id = sd.Branch_Id where cr.session_id!=sd.session_id and cr.batch_id!=sd.batch group by sd.File_No having balanceAmount.Pending_Fee > 0 limit :limit;
Delete from studentfeestaging where File_No=:File_No and FeeHead_Id not in (:FeeHead_Id);
Delete from studentfeestaging where File_No=:File_No and FeeHead_Id=:FeeHead_Id;
Delete from feedetailmaster where COURSE=:COURSE AND BRANCH=:BRANCH AND FEE_HEAD_ID=:FEE_HEAD_ID ;
select management_approval from studentdetail where file_no=:File_No;
